projects.name: Roblox 3D Fish Game - Be A Fish In A Tank
projects.description: Multiplayer fish tank game: eat food, grow, compete. Phase 2: Balance audit COMPLETE. Awaiting design decisions before proceeding to testing.
projects.revenueModel: Robux game passes + cosmetics / model sales
blockers: BLOCKING: GoldenShark mechanics decision - remove / nerf / keep as pay-to-win?
BLOCKING: Hunger system decision - enabled / disabled / decay-based?
BLOCKING: Difficulty modes design - how many? progression mechanics?
Cannot proceed to testing until these 3 decisions made
nextSteps: Jason reviews balance audit and makes 3 critical design decisions (GoldenShark, hunger, difficulty)
Implement Jason's design decisions in game mechanics
Studio testing - spawn rates, XP curves, PvP balance, cosmetics rendering
Final balance tweaks & beta submission to Roblox
